content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 48-55)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Functional Power Plant at (-9.5, 0.5)
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 0.5) facing right (working, water output)
- Boiler at (-7.0, 1.5) facing right (43 coal, producing steam)
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 1.5) facing right (working, power output 14.7kW)
- Small electric pole at (-2.5, 3.5) (connected to power network)
- Connected pipe network for water and steam transport

### Smelting and Production Complex
- Iron smelting furnace at (5.0, 0.0) (15 coal, no iron ore, status: NO_INGREDIENTS)
- Copper smelting furnace at (5.0, 4.0) (49 coal, no copper ore, status: NO_INGREDIENTS)
- Gear assembler at (8.5, 0.5) (powered, missing iron plates)
- Cable assembler at (8.5, 4.5) (powered, missing copper plates)
- Science assembler at (12.5, 2.5) (powered, missing both copper plates and gear wheels)
- Inserters at (6.5, 0.5), (6.5, 4.5), and (10.5, 0.5) (all powered but waiting for items)

### Power Distribution Network
- Multiple small electric poles forming complete power network
- All production buildings properly connected to grid

## ERROR TIPS

### Persistent Furnace Management Issues
- Repeated attempts to insert coal into full furnace inventory (50/50)
  - Clear furnace output before adding more fuel
  - Implement inventory checks before insertion attempts
  - Reduce insertion quantities to prevent overflow

### Production Chain Breakdowns
- Iron furnace stuck with no ore despite available inventory
  - Verify ore is being properly inserted into furnace input side
  - Clear any blockages in ore transport path
- Gear assembler starved of iron plates
  - Ensure iron furnace is producing and plates are being transported
- Science assembler missing both copper plates and gear wheels
  - Fix upstream production issues before addressing science pack production

### Placement and Entity Management
- Attempts to place furnace where one already exists
  - Remove existing entity before placing new one
  - Verify position is clear before placement attempts
- Failed ore insertion due to empty inventory
  - Check inventory for required items before insertion attempts
  - Implement mining operations to replenish ore supplies

### General Improvements
- Implement proper inventory monitoring system
- Add buffer chests between production stages
- Balance fuel distribution between furnaces and boiler
- Add circuit conditions to prevent overfilling inventories
- Clear all assembler outputs to prevent backups
